entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as the one who is politely apologizing to Uncle Vernon. He is described as raising his wand again and making all three glasses vanish.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as the one who is being apologized to by Dumbledore. He is described as bursting with unpleasant retorts but saying nothing.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as sitting in the cushions with Uncle Vernon and Dudley.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as sitting in the cushions with Aunt Petunia and Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who has inherited the house. Dumbledore is speaking to him as though he had not uttered anything.

relationships.description: Dumbledore was speaking to Harry as though he had not uttered anything.
